products.name: iPhone 15 Pro
products.description: Latest iPhone with advanced camera system, A17 Pro chip, and titanium design. Features 48MP main camera, 5x optical zoom, and USB-C connectivity.

products.name: MacBook Pro 16-inch
products.description: Professional laptop with M3 Pro chip, 16-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, and up to 22 hours of battery life. Perfect for developers and creative professionals.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
products.description: Android flagship with S Pen, 200MP camera, and AI-powered features. Includes 5G connectivity, wireless charging, and IP68 water resistance.

products.name: Nike Air Max 270
products.description: Comfortable running shoes with Air Max unit for maximum cushioning. Breathable mesh upper and rubber outsole for durability.

products.name: Adidas Ultraboost 22
products.description: Premium running shoes with Boost midsole technology and Primeknit upper. Responsive cushioning and energy return for optimal performance.

products.name: Levi's 501 Original Jeans
products.description: Classic straight-leg jeans with button fly and 5-pocket styling. Made from 100% cotton denim for comfort and durability.

products.name: Uniqlo Ultra Light Down Jacket
products.description: Lightweight down jacket with water-repellent finish. Packable design and warm insulation for cold weather protection.

products.name: Sony WH-1000XM5
products.description: Premium noise-canceling headphones with 30-hour battery life. Industry-leading noise cancellation and exceptional sound quality.

products.name: Canon EOS R6 Mark II
products.description: Full-frame mirrorless camera with 24.2MP sensor and 4K video recording. Advanced autofocus and image stabilization.

products.name: Dell XPS 13
products.description: Ultrabook with 13.4-inch InfinityEdge display and Intel Core i7 processor. Premium build quality and long battery life.

products.name: iPad Air 5th Generation
products.description: 10.9-inch tablet with M1 chip, Liquid Retina display, and Apple Pencil support. Perfect for creativity and productivity.

products.name: Bose QuietComfort 45
products.description: Premium wireless headphones with world-class noise cancellation and 24-hour battery life. Comfortable for extended listening.

products.name: Nike ZoomX Vaporfly NEXT%
products.description: Elite racing shoes with carbon fiber plate and ZoomX foam. Designed for maximum speed and efficiency in competition.

products.name: Adidas Stan Smith
products.description: Iconic tennis shoes with clean design and premium leather upper. Classic style that never goes out of fashion.

products.name: H&M Basic T-Shirt Pack
products.description: Pack of 3 comfortable cotton t-shirts in basic colors. Perfect for everyday wear and layering.

products.name: Zara Blazer Jacket
products.description: Elegant blazer jacket with structured fit and modern design. Perfect for professional and casual occasions.

products.name: Samsung QLED 4K TV 65-inch
products.description: Premium 4K QLED TV with Quantum Dot technology and HDR support. Immersive viewing experience with smart features.

products.name: LG OLED 55-inch C3
products.description: 55-inch OLED TV with perfect blacks and infinite contrast. AI-powered processing and gaming features.

products.name: GoPro Hero 11 Black
products.description: Action camera with 5.3K video, 27MP photos, and HyperSmooth 5.0 stabilization. Waterproof and rugged design.

products.name: DJI Mini 3 Pro Drone
products.description: Ultralight drone with 4K camera and obstacle avoidance. Perfect for aerial photography and videography.

products.name: Ray-Ban Aviator Classic
products.description: Timeless aviator sunglasses with gold frame and green lenses. Iconic design that suits any face shape.

products.name: Rolex Submariner
products.description: Luxury dive watch with automatic movement and water resistance to 300m. Iconic design with date display.

products.name: Hermès Birkin Bag
products.description: Exclusive handcrafted leather handbag with signature hardware. Made from premium materials with meticulous attention to detail.

products.name: Nike Dri-FIT Training Shorts
products.description: Moisture-wicking training shorts with built-in liner and stretch fabric. Perfect for workouts and athletic activities.

products.name: Under Armour Tech 2.0 T-Shirt
products.description: Performance t-shirt with moisture-wicking technology and anti-odor treatment. Lightweight and breathable fabric.
